resources.string: Enter your login data for Divelogs.de below. Export your logbook from Divelogs via Backup function (.sql) and open it from your file explorer. If it\'s not automatically opened with DLtoDL.de use the "Open with" menu.

The default folder for monitoring is fixed to /storage/emulated/0/Diving/. So create a folder "Diving" in your phones root memory and select this folder here to grant the app the permission to access this folder.
